channel.title: Need help making a ::commands and ::rules command? please help me easy
channel.description: i need easy step on how to make a ::commands command and also a ::rules commands. please someone help?

item.title: Need help making a ::commands and ::rules command? please help me easy
item.dc:creator: @joelx617 joelx617
item.description:
@joelx617 wrote:

ok so i dont have to retake off the commands thing? like on my source keep it still and add yours? beause most of your commands i got same ones so wont it glitchup if there 2 of each? and im using a hybrid pvp v3 im sure.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help making a ::commands and ::rules command? please help me easy

item.title: Need help making a ::commands and ::rules command? please help me easy
item.dc:creator: @ylly_powns ylly powns
item.description:
@ylly_powns wrote:

[quote=“expozee, post:2, topic:394972”]here you go
i just took it off my source

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“commands”) && (playerRights >= 0)) {
String name = command.substring(5);
sendQuest("@whi@outcastpkz -Commands", 8144); //Title
sendQuest(“Scrol down, here are the commands…”, 8145);
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dre@Player Commands", 8148);
sendQuest("::pkrewardz ::mypks,::chekpoints (name),::pub,::tz", 8149);
sendQuest("::max,::war,::male,::female,::suggestion (text here)", 8150);
sendQuest("@whi@Mods Commands", 8151);
sendQuest("::tank(for 99 def),::mute,::ipmute", 8152);
sendQuest("::jail,::unjail,::xteleto,::food", 8153);
sendQuest("@red@Admins Commands", 8154);
sendQuest("::pickup,::banuser,::ipban,::emote,::master", 8155);
sendQuest("::ipmute,::unmute,::mute,::jail,::unjail", 8156);
sendQuest("@gre@Owner Commands", 8157);
sendQuest("::unban,::unipban,::giveadmin.::givemod", 8158);
sendQuest("::unipmute,::vent,::add,::demote,::giveowner", 8159);
sendQuest(" @whi@Owner Twinp", 8160);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
sM(“Read Commands Good!”);
}[/quote]
next time put it as code.:L Also joelx617 u shud tell us what ur using. Delta, Project insanity etc? expozee if I had 15+ rep I would rep u:L

Read full topic
item.source: Need help making a ::commands and ::rules command? please help me easy

item.title: Need help making a ::commands and ::rules command? please help me easy
item.dc:creator: @expozee expozee
item.description:
@expozee wrote:

here you go
i just took it off my source

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“commands”) && (playerRights >= 0)) {
String name = command.substring(5);
sendQuest("@whi@outcastpkz -Commands", 8144); //Title
sendQuest(“Scrol down, here are the commands…”, 8145);
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("@dre@Player Commands", 8148);
sendQuest("::pkrewardz ::mypks,::chekpoints (name),::pub,::tz", 8149);
sendQuest("::max,::war,::male,::female,::suggestion (text here)", 8150);
sendQuest("@whi@Mods Commands", 8151);
sendQuest("::tank(for 99 def),::mute,::ipmute", 8152);
sendQuest("::jail,::unjail,::xteleto,::food", 8153);
sendQuest("@red@Admins Commands", 8154);
sendQuest("::pickup,::banuser,::ipban,::emote,::master", 8155);
sendQuest("::ipmute,::unmute,::mute,::jail,::unjail", 8156);
sendQuest("@gre@Owner Commands", 8157);
sendQuest("::unban,::unipban,::giveadmin.::givemod", 8158);
sendQuest("::unipmute,::vent,::add,::demote,::giveowner", 8159);
sendQuest(" @whi@Owner Twinp", 8160);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
sM(“Read Commands Good!”);
}

Read full topic
